PaceCalculator.title: Pace Calculator
PaceCalculator.hours_description: Enter the number of hours elapsed

ActivityForm.title: Or log an activity manually
ActivityForm.description: Save each run with its date, distance and duration.

DistanceVolume.title: Distance volume
DistanceVolume.description: Distance evolution over the last 12 months, aggregated by week or month

TrainingProgram.title: Training Program
TrainingProgram.description: Set your goal distance and target finish time to generate a personalized weekly plan.
TrainingProgram.timeHelper: Set the finish time you want for your {distance} {unit}.
TrainingProgram.frequencyHelper: Pick how many runs you want each week.
TrainingProgram.planIntro: The plan balances easy mileage, quality sessions and long runs calibrated to your target finish time.
TrainingProgram.noPlan: Select a goal distance and finish time to view your plan.

focus.base: Build your aerobic foundation and consistency.
focus.build: Add controlled intensity and extend endurance.
focus.taper: Reduce volume, stay sharp and arrive fresh.

5k.base: Strides: 6 x 20 s relaxed accelerations after an easy run.
5k.build: Intervals: 6 x 400 m at interval pace with 200 m jog recoveries.
5k.peak: Race pace repeats: 3 x 1.5 km at goal pace with 3 min jog recoveries.
5k.taper: Sharpening: 4 x 200 m at race pace with full recovery.

10k.base: Tempo sampler: 3 x 6 min at steady pace with 2 min easy jog.
10k.build: Intervals: 5 x 1 km at interval pace with 3 min jog recoveries.
10k.peak: Race pace repeats: 3 x 2 km at goal pace with 2 min jog recoveries.
10k.taper: Sharpening: 5 x 400 m alternating race and slightly faster pace.

half.base: Progression run: Finish the final third near steady pace.
half.build: Tempo run: 2 x 15 min at steady pace with 5 min easy jog.
half.peak: Race pace blocks: 3 x 4 km at goal pace with 5 min easy jog.
half.taper: Sharpening: 4 x 1 km at race pace with 3 min jog recoveries.

marathon.base: Aerobic builder: 10 km at easy pace with last 2 km steady.
marathon.build: Marathon pace intervals: 3 x 5 km at goal pace with 2 km easy jog.
marathon.peak: Long progression: 24 km with final 8 km at goal pace.
marathon.taper: Sharpening: 3 x 5 km at marathon pace separated by 2 km easy.

zod.number: This field is mandatory and must be a number
zod.positive: This field must be a positive number
zod.integer: This field must be an integer
zod.date: This field is mandatory and must be a date
zod.date_too_old: La date renseign√©e est trop ancienne
zod.date_too_young: The date cannot be in the future
zod.frequency_range: Choose between 4 and 6 runs per week.
